pages.title: Sunlight Manatite
pages.text: A Manatite attuned to Light with Runes of Light.$(br)A Ring forged with this Manatite will grant the wearer satiety and, if the user choses so, can replenish vitality. When used in a staff the caster can heal and regenerate ANY living creature in a radius. Useful to heal friends and harm the undead.

pages.title: Sunlight Staffs
pages.text: Duration, Power and Range of the effects depend on the tier of the staff.$(br)Wooden is the worst. Silver has good range, but weaker effects and moderate cooldown. Gold has abysmal range, but powerful effects with a long cooldown. Archmage is the best.
